Project Flash Fluent

A Spaced Repitition learning application.

An application utilizing the spaced repetition learning technique. This project demonstrates the use of data structures in a database and Token based user authentication.

Skills Used: Binary State Tree, JWT Authentication, React, Redux, Router, Thunk, Mongoose, Express
